channel.description: Recent content on Kowarsky Ritson LLP

item.title: Asaf Mallek
item.description: Phone: 604.683.6875 ext. 230 Email: asaf@kowarsky.ca Asaf has a wide-ranging litigation practice and has appeared on behalf of his clients before the BC Court of Appeal, the BC Supreme Court, Bankruptcy Court, the BC Provincial Court, Workers’ Compensation Appeal Tribunal (WCAT), WorkSafeBC, and the BC Human Rights Tribunal. He has experience in a wide range of legal matters ranging from commercial litigation to family law to administrative and tribunal law.

item.title: Joselina Silva
item.description: 604-683-6875 ext. 227 joselina@kowarsky.ca Joselina Silva is Kowarsky Ritson’s Bookkeeper and has had over 20 years of experience in Accounting. In addition, she provides a supportive role in many aspects of organization and management of files, including correspondence with clients and related parties. Outside of work, her interests include travelling, reading, and spending time with her friends and family.

item.title: Lagrimas Tamayao
item.description: 604-683-6875 ext. 221 reception@kowarsky.ca Lagrimas returned to Kowarsky Ritson in 2017 as the Firm’s Receptionist. She is responsible for the day-to-day work of the front desk, and provides a wide range of administrative support, including preparation of Mortgage documents and communication with clients and related parties.

item.title: Ori J. Kowarsky
item.description: 604-683-6875 ext. 222 ori@kowarsky.ca Ori has a wide-ranging litigation practice and has appeared on behalf of his clients before the BC Court of Appeal, the BC Supreme Court, the Federal Court of Canada, Bankruptcy Court, every level of Provincial Court, Worksafe/BC and the BC Human Rights Tribunal. He has over fourteen years’ experience in a wide range of legal matters ranging from commercial litigation to family law to administrative and tribunal law.

item.title: Pei Yi Yeh
item.description: 604-683-6875 ext. 228 pei@kowarsky.ca Pei has a wide range of experience in legal matters from personal injury to creditors’ remedies and corporate law. She regularly appears in the BC Provincial Court and Supreme Court on behalf of her clients. Pei was called to the bar in 2018 after articling with Kowarsky Ritson LLP. She received an LLB from the University of Edinburgh, an M.Litt. in Philosophy from St. Andrews University, and a BA in Political Science from McGill University.

item.title: Richard W.H. Ritson
item.description: 604-683-6875 ext. 226 richard@kowarsky.ca Legal assistant: Lagrimas Tamayao 604-683-6875 ext. 221 reception@kowarsky.ca Richard has been a trusted advisor to his clients for over 20 years, and a partner in the firm since 2002. He has a varied practice including wills, probate/estate administration, elder law, private business advising, and real estate, mortgage and collections/foreclosure work. He received a Bachelor of Laws from the University of Victoria (1988) and a Bachelor of Arts (Hons.
